name: Ingenious Zone
tag_list: web-development, software-development, software-house, e-commerce-solutions, cms-development, wordpress-development, pakistan
overview:
Ingenious Zone has been founded in 2006, since its start we are serving our valuable clients in USA, Canada, UK and various other parts of world by providing best quality and timely services in various domains.

We have grown from 6 members team to 190+ dedicated developers, designers, data entry operators and seo specialists teams. We have our own purpose built development facilities with an option of 100% expansion in few months time.

We have developed a reliable and trustworthy name in local IT industry in past few years by showing growth and excellence. We invested on employees, training, infrastructure, clients, and environment to make our companies/organization progressive and green.

We are always looking for fresh talent, and new ideas, we believe in hard work and self motivation. We train new comers at our wholly owned subsidiary “ITR Labs” (www.itrlabs.com), a Technology Institute for IT Training Courses and Ideas Incubation.

Our Expertise:

CMS (Content Management System) E-Commerce Solutions Web Applications Mobile Phone Apps Desktop Software Data Entry SEO/SEM Social Media Marketing
